turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I want to order a drink from the Starbucks in Philadelphia on Spruce Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: going to get a grande cafe latte with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande caffe latte with almond milk to be picked up at the starbucks on spruce street, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. I appreciate your help.
